Bash("zh_abstract": "图像恢复是计算机视觉的基础性课题，但现有方法普遍采用全图统一处理策略，难以应对真实场景中退化类型与程度空间分布不均的异质退化问题，导致局部过度处理或处理不足。前期实验表明，在混合退化测试集上代表性模型的PSNR较单一退化场景下降1.5–3.0dB，验证了空间异质性建模缺失对恢复质量的影响。基于此，本项目提出多智能体协同的空间感知图像恢复框架，核心假说是：通过显式建模区域级退化状态并引入协同决策机制，可实现差异化恢复策略的自适应生成与高效部署。研究内容包括：（1）构建空间感知退化分析机制，利用SAM分割与VLM区域级退化推理生成空间退化图，实现退化类型—严重程度—空间位置的联合建模；（2）设计全局调度器与区域专家协同的层级多智能体架构，依据退化先验进行任务分解，通过策略梯度优化工具链选择与连续参数配置，并引入质量反馈闭环与一致性约束实现跨区域协调；（3）构建轨迹蒸馏驱动的轻量路由网络，将多智能体决策知识压缩为端到端可部署模型，在保持恢复质量的同时实现边缘实时推理。本项目将形成兼顾恢复精度与推理效率的异质退化图像恢复新方法，为安防监控、自动驾驶、遥感解译等场景提供高可靠视觉基础能力。",)

Bash("en_abstract": "Image restoration is a fundamental task in computer vision. However, existing methods typically adopt a unified full-image processing strategy, making it difficult to handle heterogeneous degradation where degradation types and severity vary spatially across real-world scenes, leading to over-processing or under-processing in local regions. Preliminary experiments show that representative models exhibit PSNR drops of 1.5–3.0 dB on mixed-degradation test sets compared to single-degradation scenarios, validating the impact of inadequate spatial heterogeneity modeling on restoration quality. Based on this, this project proposes a multi-agent collaborative spatially-aware image restoration framework. The core hypothesis is that explicit modeling of region-level degradation states combined with collaborative decision-making mechanisms enables adaptive generation of differentiated restoration strategies and efficient deployment. The research includes three components: \(1\) constructing a spatially-aware degradation analysis mechanism that generates spatial degradation maps using SAM segmentation and VLM-based region-level degradation reasoning, achieving joint modeling of degradation type, severity, and spatial location; \(2\) designing a hierarchical multi-agent architecture with a global scheduler and regional experts that performs task decomposition based on degradation priors, optimizes tool chain selection and continuous parameter configuration via policy gradient methods, and introduces quality feedback loops and consistency constraints for cross-region coordination; \(3\) building a trajectory distillation-driven lightweight routing network that compresses multi-agent decision knowledge into an end-to-end deployable model, enabling edge real-time inference while maintaining restoration quality. This project will establish a new method for heterogeneous degradation image restoration that balances recovery accuracy and inference efficiency, providing highly reliable visual foundation capabilities for security monitoring, autonomous driving, remote sensing interpretation, and other applications.")
